name: #WeStopAsianHate
description:
#WeStopAsianHate lets you live snippets of an Asian-American girl's life that contains an inevitable confrontation with a racist person. 


The game was developed to raise awareness of the growing Asian hate crimes in the United States of America. 

Social Media

YouTube - Enjoy Awander's devlogs and behind-the-scenes vlogs 
Discord - Meet Wanderers and talk about games (or other stuff)
